exchanges.clientSaid: Hi I wanted to enquire about photography package for my wedding
exchanges.youResponded: Hello Pooja! Thank you for contacting us. Could you please share your event dates & location?

exchanges.clientSaid: Location: Maraimalai nagar, Chennai | Venue: Sri Alwar Palace | Events: Wedding & Reception on 06/07/2025 & 07/07/2025 at 5pm & 4am
exchanges.youResponded: Thank you for sharing your details. Our team will reach you shortly to discuss further.

exchanges.clientSaid: Thanks
exchanges.youResponded: Welcome to ONE OF A KIND PHOTOGRAPHY. Your customized package details will be shared shortly.

exchanges.clientSaid: Hi
exchanges.youResponded: Hello Pooja

exchanges.clientSaid: [Submitted Engagement Flow]
exchanges.youResponded: THANK YOU FOR SUBMITTING YOUR ENGAGEMENT EVENT FLOW

exchanges.clientSaid: The pictures are nice. Can you edit few groom pictures?
exchanges.youResponded: Please send 2–3 pictures you’d like us to edit.

exchanges.clientSaid: Can you also add vows video & groom second entry in traditional video?
exchanges.youResponded: Let us check and update.

exchanges.clientSaid: Looks good, go ahead!
exchanges.youResponded: UNLOCK LINK - Edited Pictures

exchanges.clientSaid: The edited pictures are so good. Thank you.
exchanges.youResponded: Candid video first draft link shared

exchanges.clientSaid: Video seems blur. Kindly change to 1080p
exchanges.youResponded: Got it. Will update.

exchanges.clientSaid: Hi, I'm interested in booking for a 1st Birthday function.
exchanges.youResponded: Hello Rohith! Thank you for contacting OOAK. Could you please share your event details and date?

exchanges.clientSaid: It's for my daughter, Lekhya. Event is on Dec 26, 2024 at Sri Convention Hall.
exchanges.youResponded: Thank you for the details. We'll get back to you shortly with a custom package.

exchanges.clientSaid: Thank you so much for the edits — they look amazing! Just one minor change request...
exchanges.youResponded: Sure. Please let us know the timestamp and replacement clips/songs you'd like.

exchanges.clientSaid: Also at the end of video .. please remove the footage of us 3 (me holding the baby and wife). Please end with a baby-only clip.
exchanges.youResponded: Noted. We'll update the video accordingly.

exchanges.clientSaid: End with baby alone, remove awkward footage of all 3.
exchanges.youResponded: Noted. We’ll revise it and get back to you.

exchanges.clientSaid: Hello, any updates on the candid video?
exchanges.youResponded: It's under progress. Will share the draft by next week.

exchanges.clientSaid: Also add new baby clips: [Google Drive links]
exchanges.youResponded: Thank you. Changes noted.

exchanges.clientSaid: Looks good! Please call me for one last quick change.
exchanges.youResponded: Final Reels will be shared soon.

exchanges.clientSaid: It’s been 4 months since the event, please try to close this soon.
exchanges.youResponded: Apologies for the delay. Reels will be shared by EOD.

exchanges.clientSaid: Hello, we had requested some edited versions of our wedding photos.
exchanges.youResponded: Hi Sandeep! The photos are now available at https://gallery.ooak.photography/sakshixsandeep/

exchanges.clientSaid: Are these edited? The raw photos look better.
exchanges.youResponded: You can select 15–20 pics per event and send them to retouchpics@ooak.photography

exchanges.clientSaid: [Shares selected photos and requests different styles: indoor, outdoor, mandapam]
exchanges.youResponded: We’ll share 3 different sample tones in 2 days.

exchanges.clientSaid: [Later] Thanks, album looks good except reception photos are above wedding.
exchanges.youResponded: Noted, we’ll rearrange. 3 extra sheets will be added.

exchanges.clientSaid: Hi, what's the update?
exchanges.youResponded: Final print in progress. Will deliver next week.

exchanges.clientSaid: Hi, we've selected 100 pics for soft copy edit. Please confirm.
exchanges.youResponded: Got it, editing underway. Will share updates.

exchanges.clientSaid: Is it done yet?
exchanges.youResponded: Sample draft shared — please check for layout and order.

exchanges.clientSaid: Layout looks good. Can we add 10 more pictures?
exchanges.youResponded: That will require additional sheets and charges. Do you approve?

exchanges.clientSaid: Yes, but please ensure reception pics are after wedding.
exchanges.youResponded: Confirmed. Will add 2 sheets for layout adjustment.

exchanges.clientSaid: Please finish under 2k for both albums.
exchanges.youResponded: Will try and update.
